title: Pseudo-arc
summary: In general topology, the pseudo-arc is the simplest nondegenerate hereditarily indecomposable continuum.  The pseudo-arc is an arc-like homogeneous continuum, and played a central role in the classification of homogeneous planar continua. R. H. Bing proved that, in a certain well-defined sense, most continua in Rn, n â‰¥ 2, are homeomorphic to the pseudo-arc.
